name: Transportation & Directions
description: Vocabulary for navigating cities and using transportation while traveling.

vocabularies.sentence: Which bus goes to the city center?
vocabularies.definition: A vehicle used for public transport.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Toshin e iku basu wa dore desu ka?
translations.translated_sentence: 都心へ行くバスはどれですか？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Nǎ liàng gōnggòng qìchē qù shì zhōngxīn?
translations.translated_sentence: 哪辆公共汽车去市中心？

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sinae-ro ganeun beoseu-ga eodie innayo?
translations.translated_sentence: 시내로 가는 버스가 어디에 있나요?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Xe buýt nào đi đến trung tâm thành phố?
translations.translated_sentence: Xe buýt nào đi đến trung tâm thành phố?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Bis mana yang menuju ke pusat kota?
translations.translated_sentence: Bis mana yang menuju ke pusat kota?

translations.sentence_transliteration: Rót-bàt khan nǎi bpai jai-laang mueang?
translations.translated_sentence: รถบัสคันไหนไปใจกลางเมือง?

vocabularies.sentence: I need a train ticket to the airport.
vocabularies.definition: A vehicle that travels on tracks to transport passengers.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Kūkō-yuki no kippu ga hoshii desu.
translations.translated_sentence: 空港行きの切符が欲しいです。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ xūyào yī zhāng qù jīchǎng de huǒchē piào.
translations.translated_sentence: 我需要一张去机场的火车票。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Gonghang-haeng gichapyo-ga piryohaeyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 공항행 기차표가 필요해요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Tôi cần một vé tàu đến sân bay.
translations.translated_sentence: Tôi cần một vé tàu đến sân bay.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Saya perlu tiket kereta ke bandara.
translations.translated_sentence: Saya perlu tiket kereta ke bandara.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chán dtông-gaan dtŭa rót-fai bpai sà-nǎam-bin
translations.translated_sentence: ฉันต้องการตั๋วรถไฟไปสนามบิน

vocabularies.sentence: I need a taxi to the hotel.
vocabularies.definition: A car with a driver that can take you to your destination.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hoteru made takushī o onegaishimasu.
translations.translated_sentence: ホテルまでタクシーをお願いします。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ xūyào yī liàng qù jiǔdiàn de chūzūchē.
translations.translated_sentence: 我需要一辆去酒店的出租车。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hotel-kkaji taeksi-ga piryohaeyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 호텔까지 택시가 필요해요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Tôi cần một chiếc taxi đến khách sạn.
translations.translated_sentence: Tôi cần một chiếc taxi đến khách sạn.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Saya perlu taksi ke hotel.
translations.translated_sentence: Saya perlu taksi ke hotel.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chán dtông-gaan táek-sêe bpai roong-raem
translations.translated_sentence: ฉันต้องการแท็กซี่ไปโรงแรม

vocabularies.sentence: The airport is 10 minutes from here.
vocabularies.definition: The place where airplanes arrive and depart.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Kūkō wa koko kara juppun desu.
translations.translated_sentence: 空港はここから10分です。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Jīchǎng lí zhèlǐ yǒu shí fēnzhōng lùchéng.
translations.translated_sentence: 机场离这里有10分钟路程。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Gonghang-eun yeogiseo sipbun georiyeyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 공항은 여기서 10분 거리예요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sân bay cách đây 10 phút.
translations.translated_sentence: Sân bay cách đây 10 phút.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Bandaranya 10 menit dari sini.
translations.translated_sentence: Bandaranya 10 menit dari sini.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sà-nǎam-bin yùu hàak jàak tîi nîi sìp naa-tii
translations.translated_sentence: สนามบินอยู่ห่างจากที่นี่ 10 นาที

vocabularies.sentence: The train station is next to the city square.
vocabularies.definition: A place where buses or trains stop to pick up and drop off passengers.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Eki wa shi no hiroba no tonari desu.
translations.translated_sentence: 駅は市の広場の隣です。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Huǒchēzhàn zài chéngshì guǎngchǎng pángbiān.
translations.translated_sentence: 火车站在城市广场旁边。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Gichayeok-eun dosi gwangjang yeop-e isseoyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 기차역은 도시 광장 옆에 있어요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Ga tàu nằm cạnh quảng trường thành phố.
translations.translated_sentence: Ga tàu nằm cạnh quảng trường thành phố.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Stasiun kereta ada di sebelah alun-alun kota.
translations.translated_sentence: Stasiun kereta ada di sebelah alun-alun kota.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sà-tăa-nii rót-fai yùu dtìt gàp jàt-dtà-ràt glaang mueang
translations.translated_sentence: สถานีรถไฟอยู่ติดกับจัตุรัสกลางเมือง

vocabularies.sentence: I bought a ticket for the next train.
vocabularies.definition: A pass that allows access to transportation.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Tsugi no densha no kippu o kaimashita.
translations.translated_sentence: 次の電車の切符を買いました。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ mǎile yī zhāng xià yī bān huǒchē de piào.
translations.translated_sentence: 我买了一张下一班火车的票。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Daeum gicha pyo-reul sasseoyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 다음 기차 표를 샀어요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Tôi đã mua một vé cho chuyến tàu tiếp theo.
translations.translated_sentence: Tôi đã mua một vé cho chuyến tàu tiếp theo.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Saya membeli tiket untuk kereta berikutnya.
translations.translated_sentence: Saya membeli tiket untuk kereta berikutnya.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chán séu dtŭa rót-fai tîat tàt bpai láew
translations.translated_sentence: ฉันซื้อตั๋วรถไฟเที่ยวถัดไปแล้ว

vocabularies.sentence: I am using a map to find the hotel.
vocabularies.definition: A visual representation of an area showing locations and routes.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hoteru o mitsukeru tame ni chizu o tsukatte imasu.
translations.translated_sentence: ホテルを見つけるために地図を使っています。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Wǒ zhèngzài yòng dìtú zhǎo jiǔdiàn.
translations.translated_sentence: 我正在用地图找酒店。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Hotel-eul chatgi wihae jido-reul sayonghago isseoyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 호텔을 찾기 위해 지도를 사용하고 있어요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Tôi đang sử dụng bản đồ để tìm khách sạn.
translations.translated_sentence: Tôi đang sử dụng bản đồ để tìm khách sạn.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Saya menggunakan peta untuk menemukan hotel.
translations.translated_sentence: Saya menggunakan peta untuk menemukan hotel.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Chán gam-lang chái phaen-tîi pʉ̂a hǎa roong-raem
translations.translated_sentence: ฉันกำลังใช้แผนที่เพื่อหาโรงแรม

vocabularies.sentence: Turn left at the next intersection.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Tsugi no kōsaten o hidari ni magatte kudasai.
translations.translated_sentence: 次の交差点を左に曲がってください。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Zài xià gè shízì lùkǒu zuǒ zhuǎn.
translations.translated_sentence: 在下个十字路口左转。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Daeum gyocharo-eseo oenjjok-euro doseyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 다음 교차로에서 왼쪽으로 도세요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Rẽ trái ở ngã tư tiếp theo.
translations.translated_sentence: Rẽ trái ở ngã tư tiếp theo.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Belok kiri di persimpangan berikutnya.
translations.translated_sentence: Belok kiri di persimpangan berikutnya.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Líao sáai tîi sìi-yâek nâa
translations.translated_sentence: เลี้ยวซ้ายที่สี่แยกหน้า

vocabularies.sentence: Go right after the traffic light.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Shingō o sugitara migi ni itte kudasai.
translations.translated_sentence: 信号を過ぎたら右に行ってください。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Guòle hónglǜdēng hòu yòu zhuǎn.
translations.translated_sentence: 过了红绿灯后右转。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Sinhodeung-eul jinaseo oreunjjok-euro gaseyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 신호등을 지나서 오른쪽으로 가세요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Rẽ phải sau khi qua đèn giao thông.
translations.translated_sentence: Rẽ phải sau khi qua đèn giao thông.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Belok kanan setelah lampu lalu lintas.
translations.translated_sentence: Belok kanan setelah lampu lalu lintas.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Líao kwăa lăng jàak fai jà-raa-jaawn
translations.translated_sentence: เลี้ยวขวาหลังจากไฟจราจร

translations.sentence_transliteration: Ni burokku massugu susunde kudasai.
translations.translated_sentence: 2ブロックまっすぐ進んでください。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Zhí zǒu liǎng gè jiēqū.
translations.translated_sentence: 直走两个街区。

translations.sentence_transliteration: Du beullok jjuk jikjinhaseyo.
translations.translated_sentence: 두 블록 쭉 직진하세요.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Đi thẳng hai dãy nhà.
translations.translated_sentence: Đi thẳng hai dãy nhà.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Jalan lurus dua blok.
translations.translated_sentence: Jalan lurus dua blok.

translations.sentence_transliteration: Dtrong bpai sǎang chûa dtèuk
translations.translated_sentence: ตรงไปสองช่วงตึก
